title: fontQA
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922132538/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Tools](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922132538/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Tools) : fontQA**

fontQA is an collection of [python](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922132538/http:/typophile.com/wiki/python) / [robofab](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922132538/http:/typophile.com/wiki/robofab) based scripts working in [FontLab](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922132538/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontLab) 4.6 and 5 for font testing and quality assurance written by [Andreas Eigendorf](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922132538/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Andreas%20Eigendorf) for [FontShop](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922132538/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontShop). Since [ATYPI](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922132538/http:/typophile.com/wiki/ATYPI) 2005 its published and available free of charge.

[http://www.fontfont.com/fontqa/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922132538/http:/www.fontfont.com/fontqa/ "http://www.fontfont.com/fontqa/") -  
 [http://www.fontqa.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922132538/http:/www.fontqa.com/ "http://www.fontqa.com/")
author: andreas
